WorkItem.Description:
The default arena filter is not picking up the Relentless Gladiator weapons. By that I mean that all the Relentless Gladiator weapons end up in the "Other" filter. I've looked at the source data and updated it from Armory/Wowhead, to no avail. The default arena filter includes Trapjaw Rix, and my source data says that's where it's from, so I'm not seeing why they haven't matched the filter. Furthermore, if I create a new non-additive filter to remove them using the simple expression "Trapjaw" (without the quotes in the expression), they are removed.
Â 
Running 2.3.3
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Arena Filter Not Picking Up Relentless Glad. Weapons

Comments.Message:
For some reason, Trapjaw Rix keeps getting removed from the filter heading. A new filter with this corrected will soon be available, again. Just not sure if it will be removed again.

To fix the problem now, select "Tools" "Edit Item Filters" - Warning: don't hit any buttons you are not sure about...
Scroll down til you see the [+] PVP tab.
Click the PVP to select it.
Now look at the Pattern String, this is where the missing "Trapjaw Rix" should be. You can add it anywhere in the string, just be sure to not mess up any other strings. A good idea would be to click in the box and arrow down to the end of the string.
Here you will need to add "shift \" should make a | then right after that enter "Trapjaw Rix" no quotes.
Press OK, and enjoy...
If things get all screwed up, you can always redownload and get the bad filter back.
Other then that, look for the fix in next release...
